requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU, Intel i5 or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920x1080 resolution support required
  • Sound Card: Yes
  • VR Support: No
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11 / 10 / 8 / 7
  • Processor: 3+ GHz Quad Core (or higher)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Recent NVIDIA/Radeon series. 1024MB VRAM
  • Sound Card: Yes
  • VR Support: No
